attributes.action: either encourage 1 single european HGV Licence or make ALL HGV Drivers Driving in the UK take the UK Test, and for all HGV Viechles entering the country to have passed a UK MOT Test
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I belive that ALL drivers of HGV Class 1 or 2 driving on British Roads should have to pass either the UK's HGV Driving test or possibly a single European Driving Test that is up to the same standard as the UK test is now. It is no good having foriegn Truck Drivers who have passed no test and have just simply "sent off" for the entitlement to drive a Class 1 or 2 viechle and then drive on British Roads.
Also ALL HGV Viechles coming into the country should have to pass a UK MOT.
